mapper.select: SELECT `friend`.*, `users`.`phone`, `users`.`name`, `users`.`head`, `users`.`status`, `users`.`school` FROM `friend` LEFT JOIN `users` ON `friend`.friend_id = `users`.id WHERE `friend`.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY `users`.`name`
SELECT `users`.*, `friend`.`remark` FROM `users` LEFT JOIN `friend` ON `friend`.friend_id = `users`.id WHERE `friend`.user_id = #{userId} AND `friend`.friend_id = #{id}
